Package be.kdg.processor.fine.controllers.rest

Class FineRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.kdg.processor.fine.controllers.rest.FineRestController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/fine")
public class FineRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest controller for Fine package. Mapped to listen to requests on /api/fine
    Author:
    Cédric Goffin

    • Constructor Detail

      • FineRestController

        @Autowired
public FineRestController​(FineService fineService,
                          org.modelmapper.ModelMapper modelMapper)
        FineRestController constructor. Autowired via Spring.
        Parameters:
        fineService - is the service for the Fine package
        modelMapper - is a mapper that most methods use to map an object to DTO and vice versa

    • Method Detail

      • getFinesBetween

        @GetMapping("/get")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<FineDTO>> getFinesBetween​(@RequestParam("from")
                                                                                        java.lang.String from,
                                                                                        @RequestParam("to")
                                                                                        java.lang.String to)
                                                                                 throws FineException
        Method that handles incoming GET requests from /api/fine/{from}/{to}.
        Parameters:
        from - is the starting time for fines to be returned
        to - is the ending to for fines to be returned
        Returns:
        a list of FineDTOs which contain information about fines that where made between the 'from' and 'to' timestamps
        Throws:
        FineException - when the given timestamps aren't in the right order

      • acceptFine

        @PutMapping("/acceptFine/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FineDTO> acceptFine​(@PathVariable
                                                                   int id)
                                                            throws FineException
        Method that handles incoming PUT requests from /api/fine/acceptFine/{id}. Gets used to set a fine as accepted.
        Parameters:
        id - is the id of the fine to accept
        Returns:
        a FineDTO object containing the information about the accepted Fine
        Throws:
        FineException - when no Fine could be found with the supplied fine id.

      • changeFineAmount

        @PatchMapping("/changeFineAmount/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ChangeFineAmountDTO> changeFineAmount​(@PathVariable
                                                                                     int id,
                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> patch)
                                                                              throws FineException
        Method that handles incoming PATCH requests from /api/fine/changeFineAmount/{id}. Gets used to change the fine amount and motivation.
        Parameters:
        id - is the id of the Fine to patch
        patch - is a map containing the patched amount and motivation
        Returns:
        a ChangeFineAmountDTO containing the information about the changed Fine
        Throws:
        FineException - when no Fine could be found with the supplied fine id.
